alert.note: Alert for Eastern Las Animas County; Trinidad Vicinity, Western Las Animas County Below 7500 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 15 at 3:57PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Las Animas County through 430 PM MDT... At 356 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Thatcher, or 35 miles northeast of Trinidad, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Delhi and Thatcher. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM MDT for southeastern Colorado.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Las Animas County; Trinidad Vicinity, Western Las Animas County Below 7500 Ft
